title.native: 艦これ いつかあの海で
title.english: KanColle Season 2: Let's Meet at Sea

description:
A sequel to Kantai Collection: KanColle.

Shigure finds herself assigned to the 1st Striking Force 3rd Division for an important upcoming operation along with a surprising variety of other Fleet Girls. What will their role in the next big offensive against the Abyssals be?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: KanColle: See You Again on Another Quiet Blue Sea
Fleet Girls Collection KanColle 1944: いつかあの海で

tags.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

title.native: 艦隊これくしょん -艦これ-

node.description: **Miura Kazuya** is a Japanese director, episode director, animator, animation supervisor, animation director and storyboard artist.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tnks_staff)

Kensuke Tanaka, also known informally as "Tanaka" amongst the playerbase, is the creator and original programmer of the Kantai Collection (KanColle) franchise. He is also part of C2.
